triggers.name: appinstance
triggers.trigger: CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS `appinstance_before_insert` BEFORE INSERT ON `appinstance` FOR EACH ROW SET NEW.`create_by` = CURRENT_USER(), NEW.`update_by` = CURRENT_USER()

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS `appinstance_before_update` BEFORE UPDATE ON `appinstance` FOR EACH ROW SET NEW.`update_by` = CURRENT_USER(), NEW.`update_time` = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3)

field.Comment: Unique code for each business category

triggers.trigger: CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`%` TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS `coldchain`.`business_category_before_insert` BEFORE INSERT ON `coldchain`.`business_category` FOR EACH ROW SET NEW.`create_by` = CURRENT_USER(), NEW.`update_by` = CURRENT_USER()

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`%` TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS `coldchain`.`business_category_before_update` BEFORE UPDATE ON `coldchain`.`business_category` FOR EACH ROW SET NEW.`update_by` = CURRENT_USER(), NEW.`update_time` = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3)

field.Comment: Company Name

triggers.name: company
triggers.trigger: CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `company_before_insert` BEFORE INSERT ON `coldchain`.`company` FOR EACH ROW SET NEW.`create_by` = CURRENT_USER(), NEW.`update_by` = CURRENT_USER()
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `company_before_update` BEFORE UPDATE ON `coldchain`.`company` FOR EACH ROW SET NEW.`update_by` = CURRENT_USER(), NEW.`update_time` = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3)

triggers.name: datapoint
triggers.trigger: CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `dbmodel_before_insert` BEFORE INSERT ON `datapoint` FOR EACH ROW SET NEW.`create_by` = CURRENT_USER(), NEW.`update_by` = CURRENT_USER()

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `datapoint_before_insert` BEFORE INSERT ON `coldchain`.`datapoint` FOR EACH ROW BEGIN DECLARE isWanted TINYINT(1); SELECT CASE COUNT(*) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END INTO isWanted FROM `session` JOIN `tag` ON `session`.`tag_id` = `tag`.`id` JOIN `tag_wanted` ON `tag_wanted`.`tag_id` = `tag`.`id` WHERE ( (`tag_wanted`.`begin` <= NEW.`datetime` AND `tag_wanted`.`end` IS NULL) OR (`tag_wanted`.`begin` <= NEW.`datetime` AND `tag_wanted`.`end` >= NEW.`datetime`) ) AND `tag_wanted`.`active` = 1 AND `session`.`id` = NEW.`session_id`; SET NEW.`is_wanted` = isWanted, NEW.`create_by` = CURRENT_USER(), NEW.`update_by` = CURRENT_USER(); END

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `datapoint_after_insert` AFTER INSERT ON `coldchain`.`datapoint` FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE `session` SET `session`.`last_datapoint_time` = NOW(), `session`.`temperature_min` = LEAST(COALESCE(`session`.`temperature_min`, NEW.`temperature`), NEW.`temperature`), `session`.`temperature_max` = GREATEST(COALESCE(`session`.`temperature_max`, NEW.`temperature`), NEW.`temperature`), `session`.`count` = `session`.`count` + 1, `session`.`begin` = LEAST(`session`.`begin`, NEW.datetime), `session`.`end` = GREATEST(`session`.`end`, NEW.datetime) WHERE `session`.`id` = NEW.session_id; UPDATE `tag` JOIN `session` ON `tag`.`id` = `session`.`tag_id` SET `tag`.`last_datapoint_time` = NOW() WHERE `session`.`id` = NEW.`session_id`; END

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `datapoint_before_update` BEFORE UPDATE ON `coldchain`.`datapoint` FOR EACH ROW SET NEW.`update_by` = CURRENT_USER(), NEW.`update_time` = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3)
CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `dbmodel_before_update` BEFORE UPDATE ON `datapoint` FOR EACH ROW SET NEW.`update_by` = CURRENT_USER(), NEW.`update_time` = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3)
